mapper.sql: id, sku_code AS skuCode, item_code AS itemCode, price, quantity, upc, receipt_no AS receiptNo, buyer_task_detail_no AS buyerTaskDetailNo, trans_quantity AS transQuantity, sku_buysite AS skuBuysite, purchase_storage_no AS purchaseStorageNo, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, is_del AS isDel, creator, modifier
